title: A Shocking Possibility (Part 2)
body:
A Shocking Possibility (Part 2)

(You have learned the skill 'Wind Manipulation')

When Evan saw what skill he received his eyes opened wide.

He continued to look at his status window for quite some time without blinking.

"It really is wind manipulation" After a minute Evan finally came back to his senses and exclaimed out loud.

Evan was not surprised because wind manipulation is a powerful skill.

Even though wind manipulation is a powerful skill the reason he was stunned was completely different.

Up until now, after absorbing cores Evan received skills like, ice chains, shadow bullet, haste etc.

But all of these skills are normal skills.

When someone awakens as a hunter he will get a skill, like how he got his shadow walk when he was awakened.

But no one can awaken skills like wind manipulation, earth manipulation, fire manipulation, or other similar skills.
